attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: England need the money to stop child poverty and to help the eldery. Scotland look after the eldery far better than england does and they don't have to pay for university education unlike England. If England kept the money then these things would be possible. England would have more money to spend on fighting crime as well as health and education. Scotland have there own parliament let them use their own money not Englands.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
